alert.note: Alert for Mellette; Todd; Tripp (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 2:27AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Todd, west central Tripp and southern Mellette Counties through 430 AM CDT... At 327 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles southeast of Cedar Butte, or 9 miles west of White River, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Swift Bear around 335 AM CDT. White River and Horse Creek around 340 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Wood, Butte Creek, Haystack Butte, Okreek, Mosher, Carter and Witten. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
